name: io.github.pramodbhatofficial/databricks-sdk-mcp
title: Databricks MCP Server
description: 263 tools for Databricks: Unity Catalog, SQL, Compute, Jobs, Serving, and more.

environmentVariables.name: DATABRICKS_TOKEN
environmentVariables.description: Databricks personal access token or OAuth token

environmentVariables.name: DATABRICKS_MCP_TOOLS_INCLUDE
environmentVariables.description: Comma-separated list of tool modules to load (e.g. unity_catalog,sql,compute). Leave empty to load all 263 tools.
